dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S1636 IS: To redesignate certain facilities of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Feinstein introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

form.official-title: To redesignate certain facilities of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration.

section.header: Redesignation of Dryden Flight Research Center

subsection.text: The National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) Hugh L. Dryden Flight Research Center in Edwards, California, is redesignated as the NASA Neil A. Armstrong Flight Research Center.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the flight research center referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the NASA Neil A. Armstrong Flight Research Center.

section.header: Redesignation of Western Aeronautical Test Range

subsection.text: The National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) Western Aeronautical Test Range in California is redesignated as the NASA Hugh L. Dryden Aeronautical Test Range.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the test range referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the NASA Hugh L. Dryden Aeronautical Test Range.
